member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource
member.summary: Event source based logger to log different events.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.Logger
member.summary: Static logger that is exposed externally. An external application or framework can hook up a listener to this event source to log data in a custom way.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.ShowPII
member.summary: Flag which indicates whether or not PII is shown in logs. False by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.HiddenPIIString
member.summary: String that is used in place of any arguments to log messages if the 'ShowPII' flag is set to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.HeaderWritten
member.summary: Indicates whether or the log message header (contains library version, date/time, and PII debugging information) has been written.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._versionLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that indicates the current library version.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._dateLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that indicates the date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._piiOffLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that is shown when PII is off.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._piiOnLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that is shown when PII is off.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteAlways(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time. No level filtering is done on the event.
member.param: The log message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteAlways(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an event log by using the provided string argument, current UTC time and the provided arguments list.
member.param: The log message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteVerbose(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a verbose event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.

member.summary: Writes a verbose event log by using the provided string argument, current UTC time and the provided arguments list.
member.param: The log message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteInformation(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an information event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.

member.summary: Writes an information event log by using the provided string argument, current UTC time and the provided arguments list.
member.param: The log message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.summary: Writes a warning event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.

member.param: The log message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.Write(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel,System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Writes an exception log by using the provided event identifer, exception argument, string argument and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.Write(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel,System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an exception log by using the provided event identifer, exception argument, string argument, arguments list and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.LogLevel
member.summary: Minimum log level to log events. Default is Warning.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LogMessages
member.summary: Log messages and codes for Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener
member.summary: Event listener that writes logs to a file or a fileStream provided by user.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.DefaultLogFileName
member.summary: Name of the default log file, excluding its path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of that writes logs to text file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of that writes logs to text file.
member.param: location of the file where log messages will be written.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.#ctor(System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of that writes logs to text file.
member.param: StreamWriter where logs will be written.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.OnEventWritten(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventWrittenEventArgs)
member.summary: Called whenever an event has been written by an event source for which the event listener has enabled events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.TextWriterEventListener.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.
